description: Monthly-varying sea surface temperatures from years 111 to 140 of the pre-industrial control (piControl) experiment.
name: PIControlSSTMonthlyVar
rationale: To provide sea surface temperature (SST) boundary conditions for the CFMIP sstPi experiment.
longName: Monthly-varying sea surface temperatures from the pre-industrial control simulation
keywords: sea surface temperature, piControl, pre-industrial control, SST, monthly-varying
